metadata.creator: Ruben Schade
metadata.description:
55:32 – Imposter syndrome, community podcast standards, the Trump inauguration, Jimbo’s comment on my American airport security experience, the Borders bookstore in Wheelock Place, border security theater, and why we're not supposed to eat breakfast now.

Recorded in Sydney, Australia. Licence for this track: Creative Commons Attribution 3.0. Attribution: Ruben Schade.

Released January 2017 on Rubénerd and The Overnightscape Underground, an Internet talk radio channel focusing on a freeform monologue style, with diverse and fascinating hosts (this one notwithstanding).

Subscribe with iTunes, Pocket Casts, Overcast or add this feed to your podcast client.

Special thanks to the Internet Archive; their generous hosting makes this show possible.

metadata.title: Rubénerd Show 357: The borders episode
